For more information please visit : https://www.justice.gov.za/inforeg/index.html

In order to view these files, you will need the Adobe® Acrobat® Reader™, a free plugin available from Adobe Systems, Inc. Read the instructions below to obtain a copy of the plugin.

Click here to go to the Adobe Acrobat Reader download site.

Read through the steps provided on Adobe’s site and select the correct version of the plugin for your computer.
When the download is complete, click on the downloaded file to install the plugin and follow the directions on your screen.
When the setup is finished, the plugin will be installed.
